content.webTitle: What makes you happy? Share your photos and stories

fields.headline: What makes you happy? Share your photos and stories
fields.bodyText: What makes you happy? Is it something tangible like a cup of coffee or a morning run? Does it rely on someone else who plays an important role in your life? Or is it a philosophy, a way of thinking or staying in the moment? We’d love to hear what can switch your mood, and to see your pictures of yourself and what makes you happy. You can share your pictures and stories about what makes you happy by clicking on the blue ‘Contribute’ button on this article. GuardianWitness is the home of readers’ content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others.
